headline: Newsmax Founder Christopher Ruddy, Ex-NY Post Journalist, Is Now Billionaire
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Newsmax Inc.’s debut as a public company has given founder and Chief Executive Officer Christopher Ruddy a fortune of about $3.3 billion after its shares surged 735%.
